Module Basics
Package basics.math

Class Maths

java.lang.Object
basics.math.Maths
public class Maths
extends java.lang.Object
Mathematic solutions such zeros of polynomes.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static double cubicPolynome​(double x, double a, double b, double c, double d)
    Computes the function result for the cubic polynome ax3+bx2+cx+d.
    static double hypot​(double x, double y, double z)
    Like Math.hypot(double,double) but for three dimensions, i.e. sqrt(x2+y2+z2).
    static double quadraticPolynome​(double x, double a, double b, double c)
    Computes the function result for the quadratic polynome ax2+bx+c.
    static double[] realZerosCubicPolynome​(double a, double b, double c, double d)
    Computes the real zero for the cubic polynome, i.e. the x for ax3+bx2+cx+d=0.
    static double[] realZerosQuadraticPolynome​(double a, double b, double c)
    Computes the real zero for the quadratic polynome, i.e. the x for ax2+bx+c=0.

  • Method Details

    • hypot

      public static double hypot​(double x, double y, double z)
      Like Math.hypot(double,double) but for three dimensions, i.e. sqrt(x2+y2+z2).
      Parameters:
      x - x
      y - y
      z - z
      Returns:
      hypot value

    • quadraticPolynome

      public static double quadraticPolynome​(double x, double a, double b, double c)
      Computes the function result for the quadratic polynome ax2+bx+c.
      Parameters:
      x - variable x
      a - coefficent for x2
      b - coefficent for x
      c - constant term
      Returns:
      y for given x

    • realZerosQuadraticPolynome

      public static double[] realZerosQuadraticPolynome​(double a, double b, double c)
      Computes the real zero for the quadratic polynome, i.e. the x for ax2+bx+c=0. Note there are 0 or 2 real zeros. Further note that in case of 0 real zero, there are two complex zeros that are not returned by this function. As a last note: if two of zeros are equal, they are both returned.
      Parameters:
      a - coefficent for x2
      b - coefficent for x
      c - constant term
      Returns:
      array of zero or two with all real zeros

    • cubicPolynome

      public static double cubicPolynome​(double x, double a, double b, double c, double d)
      Computes the function result for the cubic polynome ax3+bx2+cx+d.
      Parameters:
      x - variable x
      a - coefficent for x3
      b - coefficent for x2
      c - coefficent for x
      d - constant term
      Returns:
      y for given x

    • realZerosCubicPolynome

      public static double[] realZerosCubicPolynome​(double a, double b, double c, double d)
      Computes the real zero for the cubic polynome, i.e. the x for ax3+bx2+cx+d=0. Note there are 1 or 3 real zeros. Further note that in case of 1 real zero, there are two complex zeros that are not returned by this function. As a last note: if two of the three zeros are equal, they are both returned.
      Parameters:
      a - coefficent for x3
      b - coefficent for x2
      c - coefficent for x
      d - constant term
      Returns:
      array of one or three with all real zeros
